page.title: 07 BALTERLEY POST OFFICE.
page.content: Balterly Post Office is a small country shop.There are hardly any houses near it except a few cottages and an occasional farmhouse.Mr Dean has owned the Post Office for 32 years.As well as a Post Office he also sells groceries.Before the building was a Post Office it was an Inn.It is over 200years old and is in an acre of land with some outbuildings one of which was a bakery for bread. Most customers come from Audley or Balterley.In 1934 Mr Dean toured Balterley as a travelling salesman. After World War 2 Mr Dean returned to take over Post Office.He is usually very busy but he thinks working in a shop is most interesting if you like the company of different types of people.Mr Dean thinks the people of Balterley are very friendly.
